Age > = 18 year life expectancy > 12 week . Evidence measurable primary Central Nervous System ( CNS ) neoplasm contrast enhance MRI . An interval least one week prior biopsy four week surgical resection enrollment protocol . Karnofsky > = 60 % . Hemoglobin > = 9g/dl , absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) > = 1,500 cells/microliter , platelet > = 125,000 cells/microliter . Serum creatinine ≤ 1.5 mg/dl , serum serum glutamic oxaloacetic transaminase ( SGOT ) direct bilirubin ≤ 1.5 time upper limit normal ( total bilirubin great equal 1.5 x upper limit normal , direct bilirubin must ≤ 1.5 x upper limit normal ) . Signed informed consent approve Institutional Review Board prior patient entry . If sexually active , patient take contraceptive measure duration treatment .
